ocpi.create_success: OCPI settings have been created successfully
ocpi.create_error: Error occurred while creating the OCPI settings
ocpi.update_success: OCPI settings have been updated successfully
ocpi.update_error: Error occurred while updating the OCPI settings
ocpi.description: E-Mobility provides standard and certified APIs to connect to an external E-Roaming Platform. This feature exposes real-time the charging station infrastructure and availability via the OCPI standard protocol (Open Charge Point Interface). E-Mobility is currently using the Gireve Inter-Operability Platform (IOP).

refund.description:
E-Mobility provides Refunds APIs for an external expense system.
This feature allow the Electric Vehicle driver to push any sessions he has done to an expense system and get reimbursed of the electricity he consumed.

E-Mobility is currently using SAP Concur. More technical information here.
refund.create_success: Refunding settings have been created successfully
refund.create_error: Error occurred while creating the Refunding settings
refund.update_success: Refunding settings have been updated successfully
refund.update_error: Error occurred while updating the Refunding settings

concur.revoke_error: Error occurred while revoking your connection with Concur

pricing.description: The Pricing interface enables pricing capabilities for charging stations providers.
pricing.create_success: Pricing settings have been created successfully
pricing.create_error: Error occurred while creating the Pricing settings
pricing.update_success: Pricing settings have been updated successfully
pricing.update_error: Error occurred while updating the Pricing settings
pricing.full_description_part_1: E-Mobility provides two ways to compute the price of an EV session. The simple one allows you to setup a fixed price per kW.h of your charging infrastructure. E-Mobility provides also advanced Pricing APIs for external complex Pricing Plan and Invoicing tools. This feature allows you to manage complex payment methods and services for operators such as prepaid and postpaid accounts, fixed or variables session costs given peaks hours. E-Mobility is currently using SAP Convergent Charging (part of SAP Hybris Billing). More technical information available at
pricing.full_description_part_2: To enable one of these features, please contact your E-Mobility representative.

convergentcharging.description: E-Mobility provides Pricing APIs for external complex Pricing Plan and Invoicing tools. This feature allows you to manage complex payment methods and services for operators such as prepaid and postpaid accounts, fixed or variables session costs given peaks hours. E-Mobility is currently using SAP Convergent Charging (part of SAP Hybris Billing). To enable this feature, please contact your E-Mobility representative. More technical information available at
convergentcharging.title: Convergent Charging

simple.description: E-Mobility provides a simple way to compute the price of an EV session. This feature allows you to setup a fixed price per kW.h of your charging infrastructure. To enable this feature, please contact your E-Mobility representative.
simple.title: Simple Pricing

sac.setting_do_not_exist: SAP Analytics Cloud Settings not found
sac.setting_not_found: SAP Analytics Cloud Settings not found

sac.create_error: Error occurred while creating the SAP Analytics Cloud settings
sac.update_success: SAP Analytics Cloud settings have been updated successfully
sac.update_error: Error occurred while updating the SAP Analytics Cloud settings
sac.description: E-Mobility exposes its data to external analytics tools. This feature exposes real-time all the session data through a connector to external data analytics tools. E-Mobility is currently using SAP Analytics Cloud via an OData connector. SAP Analytics Cloud supports the intelligent use of charging data to simplify operational decision making. More technical information available at
